original_text: And on the fifteenth day of the same month is the feast of unleavened bread unto the Lord: seven days ye must eat unleavened bread.
korean_text: 이 달 열닷샛날은 여호와의 무교절이니 이레 동안 너희는 무교병을 먹을 것이요

sentences.original_text: And on the fifteenth day of the same month
is the feast of unleavened bread unto the Lord
seven days ye must eat unleavened bread
sentences.korean_translation: 7일 동안 너희는 누룩 없는 빵을 먹어야 합니다
